name: Sex Story - Ruby and Hunter - Episode 1
name_original: Sex Story - Ruby and Hunter - Episode 1
description:
A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. Hunter stumbles inside an empty bar and meets Ruby - a sexy redhead bartender that offers to give him a ride home, only to end up riding him in the dirty restroom.

Game description

Watch out, hotties! There’s a brand new Visual Novel Series waiting for you to discover. For those familiar with our Sex Diary and Sex Adventure Series, we have prepared a hot new steamy romance that will tickle your senses and stir up your blood.

Meet Ruby & Hunter and follow their wild SEX STORY in a new and captivating format.

EPISODE 1 brings you a bored and single Hunter, who goes with a couple of old friends to have some beers in the vibrant Bar District. The boys end up pretty drunk, so Hunter decides to secure them in the only available cab and send them home, then goes in search of another ride on the streets of the now empty District.
Out of luck and out of battery to call himself a ride, he tries his chance inside the only Bar still open, hoping to find someone nice enough to help him.

His journey brings him to Ruby - a very sexy vixen and owner of the place, who makes him an offer he can’t refuse: wait until she closes the Bar, and she’ll be more than happy to give the hot stranger a ride home.

Will Hunter end up a prey in the naughty bartender’s game?
Follow their Sex Story and find out.
